short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads Extend Switch Role configurations from S3 and pushes to Extend Switch Roles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AESR S3 Config Sender is a Google Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of updating your AESR (AWS Extend Switch Roles) configuration. The extension achieves this by pulling the latest configuration from an S3 bucket. 

Once installed, users can save new AWS S3 profiles by entering the required information in the fields provided and clicking the "Save Profile" button. The profile will then be saved to the browser's local storage. Profiles contains the necessary access key, secret key, region, S3 bucket name, and S3 file key. Users can send the configuration to AWS Extend Switch Roles by entering the AESR extension ID in the field provided and clicking the "Save" button.

The extension provides an intuitive interface that makes the process of updating AESR configurations quick and straightforward.
